segments.advisor_message: Alright, before we wrap up, can you tell me your dependent's full name?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's Sophie Johnson, but, um, we usually just call her Soph.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And when was she born?
segments.client_message: She was born on 15-08-2015, so, uh, she's eight now, I think.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect! And just to confirm, how long will she be considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Oh, right, um, that's till 2026 for us, so, you know, just until she's 18, I guess...
